      void Simulation.endSimulation(Robot robotIn, int noOfSteps)
      Prints out the number of steps a robot has travelled, once it has finished exploring

      Controls the robot using the frontier based algorithm
      java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> Simulation.mapRouteToPoint(Robot robotIn, java.awt.Point targetPointIn)
      Maps a route from the robots current position to the target point (using A* path finding algorithm)
      boolean Simulation.nextStepToPoint(Robot robotIn, java.awt.Point targetPointIn)
      Makes the robot take the next step towards a point (only used when the point is one square away from the robots current position).
      boolean Simulation.obstacleInFront(Robot robotIn)
      Checks if there is an obstacle present in front of the robot (simulates front ultrasonic sensor) and if there isn't an obstacle adds the points around the searched point to the list of frontier points
      boolean Simulation.obstacleToLeft(Robot robotIn)
      Checks if there is an obstacle present to the left of the robot (simulates front ultrasonic sensor) and if there isn't an obstacle adds the points around the searched point to the list of frontier points
      boolean Simulation.obstacleToRight(Robot robotIn)
      Checks if there is an obstacle present to the right of the robot (simulates front ultrasonic sensor) and if there isn't an obstacle adds the points around the searched point to the list of frontier points
      boolean Simulation.previouslySearchedFront(Robot robotIn)
      Checks if the point in front of the robot has been searched previously
      boolean Simulation.previouslySearchedLeft(Robot robotIn)
      Checks if the point to the left of the robot has been searched previously
      boolean Simulation.previouslySearchedRight(Robot robotIn)
      Checks if the point to the right of the robot has been searched previously
      void Simulation.proprietaryAlgorithmLoop(Robot robotIn)
      Controls a robot using My Proprietary Algorithm
